001package org.nasdanika.persistence;
002
003import java.util.List;
004
005import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
006import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
007
008/**
009 * Functional interface for object creation. 
010 * @author Pavel
011 *
012 * @param <T>
013 */
014public interface ObjectFactory<T> {
015        
016        /**
017         * Creates an object of requested type with a given config.
018         * @param ObjectLoader for creating object parts. 
019         * @param config
020         * @param base Base URL for resolving references.
021         * @param progressMonitor 
022         * @param marker Optional source marker for troubleshooting.  
023         * @return Created object
024         */
025        T create(ObjectLoader loader, Object config, URI base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, List<? extends Marker> markers);        
026
027}
